ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Breaking into the enemy vault is a two-man job.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: "Kill the lights!"

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: “Let your plans be dark and impenetrable as night, and when you move, fall like a thunderbolt.” - ancient Terran tactician

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: You are part of the land. Let it work with you, fight for you.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Spread democracy, whether they like it or not.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: There's no stopping progress, but maybe we can slow it down a bit.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: "Divert power to deflectors, engines, weapons - just divert it everywhere!"

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: You came in that thing? You're braver than I thought!

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Modern craft are equipped with a combination of sandcasters, point defense lasers, and microthrusters.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: This device allows the user to communicate at faster-than-light speeds.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: A type II civilization can harness all the energy from its star by means of a system-sized solar collector.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: "Get every available craft in the air, now!"

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Attack ships on fire off the shoulder of Orion. C-beams glitter in the dark near the Tannhäuser Gate.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: It should be a cushy job, playing waiter to this two-bit word-dealer.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: An unplanned shift from hyperspace to regular space can be quite... unpleasant.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: For when there are no more options.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: "Speak softly and carry a big stick; you will go far." - ancient Terran leader

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Each one as capable as the last, ready to fight and die for their brothers.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: To achieve an amenable solution one must see the problem from all perspectives.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: They are now indistinguishable from us in every respect.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: A free-flowing exchange of ideas.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: A schoolyard game to practice your stealth abilities.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Formal education to give you the fundamentals.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Learn to fly in formation and trust your squadmates.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Physical conditioning to ensure you can make it on the battle field.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Practice your rhetoric and lead the club to regionals!

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: A baking soda volcano is a rite of passage for a budding scientist.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Anything goes at this all-inclusive beachside resort.

ObjectStates.Name: DeckCustom
ObjectStates.Description: Bonuses to help overcome obstacles or give special abilities.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Reveal all obstacles for one turn. (Play any time.)

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Reveal all obstacles for one turn. (Play any time.)

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Refresh the market.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Refresh the market.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Increase your personnel counter by 1, up to your maximum. (Play in between rounds.)

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Increase your personnel counter by 1, up to your maximum. (Play in between rounds.)

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Prevent the loss of personnel for the rest of the turn.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Prevent the loss of personnel for the rest of the turn.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Reveal all rewards for one turn. (Play any time.)

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Reveal all rewards for one turn. (Play any time.)

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Draw 3 element cards. (Can exceed maximum hand limit until end of turn. Play any time.)

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Draw 3 element cards. (Can exceed maximum hand limit until end of turn. Play any time.)

ObjectStates.Name: DeckCustom
ObjectStates.Description: Player-specific special abilities to help you in the game.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: When sharing cards, you share (face up) before your allies.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: If you share 3 cards, you may draw 1 element.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: The final obstacle and reward is always face up on your turn.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: When sharing cards, your allies share (face up) before you.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Choose an element (except luck). For the rest of the game, you may discard a card to produce one symbol of that element.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Your max hand size is always 8. You start with 4 personnel, and this is your maximum.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: You may share between zero and four cards.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Once per round on your turn, when you fail an obstacle you may shuffle that obstacle back into the obstacles deck (with taking damage) and replace it with the top one from the deck. You may then retry that obstacle.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Credits you accumulate do not need to be spent immediately.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: You may discard a card to use the power of one of your allies.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: You may see rewards one farther in advance (only on your turn).

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: You may use two of the same element in place of a luck.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Every time a player loses a personnel, draw a basic elements card.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: You may pay 2 credits to increase your personnel by one. You may not go above your maximum (8).

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: You may withdraw before engaging with the first obstacle by discarding two cards.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: You can only share 1 card. Two cards are drawn from the basic elements deck and added to the pool when you share.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: You may roll a D4 to begin your turn based on the number displayed.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Your hand size is one greater than your current personnel.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: You may announce 1 card you are sharing aloud before you share. (You need (not) be honest.)

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: You may peek at one random card in your teammate's hand while they're blindfolded.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: You may trade in triples of elements to draw 3 new elements at any time.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Once per round you may peek at the top card of any deck.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: You may lose 1 personnel to gain 1 credit.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: You may spend 1 credit to look at the top card of any deck and choose to keep it on the top of place it at the bottom of the deck.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: You approach obstacles in reverse order. You cannot disengage.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: You may discard cards equal to your current personnel to return your personnel to max.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: At any time you may discard a reward card to draw an element card.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: When you draw basic element cards, draw 2 extra and then discard 2 cards.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: You may generate a luck symbol by forcing all other players to discard a card. You cannot ask permission to do this, nor give them warning.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: You may discard a macguffin to return your personnel to max.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: You and your allies win if you (the Savior) hold three unique macguffins in your hand.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: If you hold three macguffins in your hand, you are the sole victor of this game.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Play with the top card of the elements deck face up for everyone.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: You may pay 1 credit to look at the top 4 cards of the obstacle deck and arrange them in any order.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Whenever the market is refreshed, you choose which card goes where.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Once per turn you may trade a card with another player. You must declare what you are trading and what you will accept and the other players can either agree or disagree.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: You start with 5 credits.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: You may address obstacles in any order. You cannot see any obstacle until you choose to engage with it. You cannot see rewards until you earn them.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: You go last every round.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Everyone takes 1 damage.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: All damge is now doubled.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Add a reward to the first obstacle.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Remove one market slot.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Remove two market slots.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Remove the first reward slot.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Only one player can contribute to the pool (before seeing the obstacles).

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Anyone who doesn't contribute to the pool (including the current player) must discard a card.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Discard down to your personel size at the end of your turn.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Discard down to your personel size as you take damage.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Discard your culture card and draw a new one from the top of the deck.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Everyone heals 1 damage. +1 cost

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: No luck can be played.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Refresh the market at the end of every turn

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Add one element card covering each remaining macguffin

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Add a fifth obstacle and fourth reward (no extra credits).

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Rewards from the market cost one more credit.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: The second reward slot awards no credits.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Max hand size is decreased by one.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: The fourth obstacle stays facedown during the pooling phase.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: The third obstacle stays facedown during the pooling phase.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: The second obstacle stays facedown during the pooling phase.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: The first obstacle stays facedown during the pooling phase.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: You cannot contribute 3 cards to the pool.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: You cannot contribute 2 cards to the pool.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: You cannot contribute 1 card to the pool unless you only have one card.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Cultural powers cannot be used.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: The active player reveals one card at the beginning of their turn.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: The player who unlocks this macguffin must go first for the rest of the game.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Give your culture card to the player to your left.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Give your culture card to the player to your right.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: When this macguffin is unlocked, each player rolls their personnel die. This is their new personnel.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Take one damage when you encounter an obstacle with repeated symbols.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: You lose the game unless this mcguffin is unlocked last.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: You lose the game unless this mcguffin is revealed first.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Reverse luck symbols require luck.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Roll the D-element at the beginning of each turn, that element can be used as luck for the remainder. x6

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Reverse luck symbols require ____. x6

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: The market doesn't refresh at the end of the round.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Solving an obstacle with ____ causes you to discard a card. x6

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Lose one personnel every time you use a curse word.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: When you unlock this macguffin, you may replace one macguffin with one drawn randomly from the red deck.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: When you unlock this macguffin, you may replace one macguffin with one drawn randomly from the green deck.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: When you unlock this macguffin, you must replace it with one drawn randomly from the red deck.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: When you unlock this macguffin, you must replace it with one drawn randomly from the green deck.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Players must discard their hands at the end of each round.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: After each pooling phase, draw one element card to add to the pool.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Before each pooling phase, draw one element card to add to the pool.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: No effect.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: When you unlock this macguffin, remove one card from one locked macguffin.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: When you unlock this macguffin, draw one reward card from the top of the reward deck to your hand. .

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: When you unluck this macguffin, your turn is skipped until another macguffin is unlocked on a subsequent turn.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Accomplishing the fourth obstacle earns an extra credit.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Your hand size is one more than your personnel.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Each player discards a card when any player loses personnel.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Add a fourth market slot.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: The first reward is always face up.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: The second reward is always face up.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: The third reward is always face up.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: A single luck element card can be used to surpass an obstacle.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Your hand size is equal to the player's with the smallest max hand size.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Your hand size is equal to the player's with the largest max hand size.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: You may discard your hand to avoid losing a personnel.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Before the pooling phase, the active player discards their hand and the non-active players draw to their max hand size.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: When you would lose personnel, your neighbour to the left loses it instead.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: When you would lose personnel, your neighbour to the right loses it instead.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: When you would lose personnel, the player with the highest personnel loses it instead. If tied, you choose.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Reaching zero personnel is not a loss condition. You play with a hand of zero cards.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Reaching zero personnel resets your personnel to max rather than ending the game.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: You may discard a luck card in lieu of a credit. Do this only during your turn when one would buy from the market.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: On obstacle cards, treat ____ as reverse luck and reverse luck as ____. x6

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Your max hand size is 6 minus your personnel.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Add 10 Unity cards to the elements deck then shuffle that deck.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: When you apply a reward to a macguffin, you may instead choose to apply the card from the top of the reward deck (make the decision before looking).

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Just before the first turn of the game, halve the rewards deck. Shuffle 4 macguffin cards into the one half then place that half on the top. Each of these macguffin cards can be used to remove one card from this macguffin.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Discard a card every time you say a number.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: The next macguffin you unlock after this one has no effect.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: If you unlock this macguffin and another one in the same turn, you win the game.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: When you play an ____ element card from your hand (not from the pool), draw a card. x6

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Reward cards with three elements can only be used for two of their elements at a time.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Reward cards with two elements can only be used for one of their elements at a time.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: When you unlock this macguffin, shuffle the discarded element cards back into the deck.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: When you unlock this macguffin, shuffle the discarded reward cards back into the deck.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: You cannot use reward cards with special abilities except during your turn.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: You cannot use reward cards with special abilities on your turn.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Every player loses one personnel when the market is refreshed.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: At the start of each pooling phase, while the active player is blind, draw one card from the elements deck. If it matches an obstacle, discard it, otherwise add it to the pool. The blinded player should have no way of knowing if this card is in the pool.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: When you unlock this McGuffin, draw one reward card: if it matches a card locking a McGuffin, use it toward unlocking.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: The first reward slot awards a credit. The second and third slots do not.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Losing personnel instead causes you to gain personnel. If anyone goes above their max personnel, everyone loses.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: As soon as this macguffin is unlocked, player turn order is reversed.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: No other macguffin effects take place until this one is unlocked.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Do not reveal the second obstacle's reward when you finish the first obstacle.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Do not reveal the third obstacle's reward when you finish the second obstacle.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Do not reveal the fourth obstacle's reward when you finish the third obstacle.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Draw element cards until you reach a double. This MacGuffin costs 3 of that element.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: The player who unlocks this MacGuffin gets 1 credit for each other remaining MacGuffin to spend immediately.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: One card is discarded from the pool until this MacGuffin is unlocked.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Select a culture card, any player may choose to use that culture's effect for the rest of the game.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: The player who unlocks this now uses the element deck as their hand. Players draw from their hand randomly.

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: A = number of people who RSVPed "yes" to the invitation to this gaming event. B = number of people who showed up. C = the number of half-hours between the first and last arrival. D = the number of remaining MacGuffins. The cost for this is A - B + C + D.
